title: Negative IP after refund and purchas
body: I went and got 2 champion refunds for IP and had a total of 8000+ IP. I then went and got a new champion for 4800 IP and my IP was set to -1157. I can't buy anything anymore either.

replies.body: Its okay now It took like a day or so but it went back to normal Thank you

I don't see that on our end. Try restarting your PC then hop into the store and *attempt* buying something really low in IP cost, but don't **actually** buy it.

Let me know if this helped.
